editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is known and valued all over the world. It helps top athletes, students, extreme athletes, and people with demanding professions, as well as during long car journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is the same Red Bull energy drink, but without sugar

editions.name: The Summer Edition
editions.flavor_description: The summer version Red Bull Summer Edition offers the taste of White Peach with light citrus notes and floral undertones

editions.name: The Yellow Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Yellow Edition. Immerse yourself in the exotic taste of Tropical Fruits

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Red Edition with the taste of Watermelon
